title: Mel & Jonah’s Baby Eczema Cream Treatment | AVEENO®
description:
When Jonah first started to show eczema symptoms, Mel didn’t know how to get rid of her baby’s eczema.  She also didn’t know that it was hereditary, and needed to treat her flare-ups as well.

Learn how these doctor-recommended eczema treatment products from AVEENO®, like the AVEENO® Baby Eczema Therapy Moisturizing Cream and the AVEENO® Eczema Therapy Hand Cream, helped Mel & Jonah get rid of eczema.

asset.author: aveeno

transcripts: My skin has always been an issue for me, I didn't even realize that eczema can run in families until I became a mom. And wouldn't you know it soon after Jonah was born eczema started developing all over his body, when I asked my pediatrician how to treat it, she recommend Aveeno baby eczema therapy once we started using Aveeno I noticed an improvement in Jonah's  skin and mood immediately. I'm so grateful for Aveeno's eczema products, they made a big difference for both of us.
